entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 except minus 3 along the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
